titleStmt.title: A Letter directed to Master Bridgeman, the fourth of January, and a letter inclosed in it to one Master Anderton, were this day read and ordered to be entred, to the worshipfull, and much honoured friend Orlando Bridgeman Esquire, and a burgesse of the Parliament, at his chamber, at the Inner-Temple, these present.
titleStmt.author: R. E.
Bridgeman, Orlando, Sir, 1608-1674.
Anderton, Master.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bristol Public Library.
